name: E.A.T (EARLY ACCESS) (IN DEVELOPMENT)
description:
Hello, welcome to my first real "game"...

This Project is still being worked on and will probably be finished in a few months when i learn godot... im a inspiring indie game developer... im only 13 so im not sure if i might make it full time for making games. this is the first real project ive done... i still have so much to learn so next update will hopefully be big... there is no plot to the game yet. the plot gets added in once i have learned GDScript... im using Godot to make this... pls give some feedback
